Name: Robot.Start - Puzzle Game
About the game: In this puzzle game, play as an agile robot whose duty is to turn on the facility computers. To do so, all activation buttons in each area must be/remain pressed. Find a way to reach each button and access the next area! Handcrafted levels with increasing complexity. Sokoban elements. Robot moves in 4 directions, gliding just above the ground. Music by Eric Matyas - soundimage.org Note: Restart Level: 'R' on keyboard, 'B' on controller.
